channel.title: Two things plz help ='(

item.title: Two things plz help ='(
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“brandon3, post:1, topic:22848”]okay number 1

1:Is there any code to make it so the rubber chicken whacks ppl?

2: I want this saradomin wiz to talk but he isnt but my santa and barrows ppl are. Heres the code

[code]}

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1264) {
					if (misc.random2(30) <=3) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                              			npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                              			npcs[i].textUpdate = "hi.";
					}
				}[/code]

Any fixing? im thinking its the <=3 part, not sure tho

if any one can fix ty ill rep u[/quote]
I’ll fix your second question, because I don’t even know if there is a code, open NPCHandler.java, and press control, hold it and press f.
Type in moo and you will come up with this

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

See the last }? Press enter after that and paste this, this will get the NPC you want talking;

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1264) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "hi.";
						}
					}

Hope I could help

Read full topic
